## 📺 Show Description

*The Big Bang Theory* is an American television sitcom created by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady. The show premiered on CBS on **September 24, 2007**, and concluded on **May 16, 2019**, airing a total of **279 episodes** over **12 seasons**.

- **Leonard Hofstadter** and **Sheldon Cooper** (physicists at Caltech)
- **Penny** (aspiring actress)
- **Howard Wolowitz** (aerospace engineer)
- **Raj Koothrappali** (astrophysicist)

The show humorously explores their social awkwardness, romantic relationships, and love for science and pop culture.

## 📈 Viewership Over Time

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
viewership <- data.frame(
  Season = 1:12,
  US_Viewers_millions = c(8.31, 10.00, 14.23, 13.92, 15.82, 18.68,
                          19.96, 18.63, 15.21, 14.00, 14.52, 17.31)
)

ggplot(viewership, aes(x = Season, y = US_Viewers_millions)) +
  geom_line(color = "blue", size = 1.5) +
  geom_point(color = "red", size = 3) +
  labs(title = "U.S. Viewership by Season",
       x = "Season", y = "Viewers (millions)") +
  theme_minimal()
```
